byline.contributor: Al Baker and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and NATE SCHWEBER

abstract: New York City police say Henry Maldonado fatally stabbed Carmen Irizarry, his longtime girlfriend, in her Bronx apartment; Maldonado, who also wounded Irizarry's 9-year-old granddaughter before setting apartment on fire, is arrested at scene.
lead_paragraph: A man attacked his girlfriend, 60, and injured her granddaughter in the St. Mary’s Park Houses before setting the apartment on fire and injuring himself, officials said.

headline.main: Woman Killed and Girl, 9, Injured in Stabbing at Bronx Apartment
headline.print_headline: Man Kills Girlfriend and Hurts Girl, 9, Then Sets Home on Fire, Police Say

snippet: A man attacked his girlfriend, 60, and injured her granddaughter in the St. Mary’s Park Houses before setting the apartment on fire and injuring himself, officials said.
